Sentencas: Thin (similar to 30-45 mu m) gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) electrolyte, Ni + yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) anode-supported cells were fabricated with platinum reference electrodes (probes) embedded within the electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The exposed parts of the probes were sealed off from the atmosphere using an oxygen impermeable glass.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, no oxygen exchange could occur and voltage measurements at the probes correspond to the reduced negative electrochemical potential of electrons (psi = -(mu) over tilde (e)/e, where (mu) over tilde is the electrochemical potential of electrons and e is the electronic charge).
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The p was measured at 650 degrees C under open circuit conditions with air circulated past the cathode and hydrogen circulated past the anode.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage was similar to 0.84 V.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The voltages between the anode and reference electrodes were very small-less than 30 mV. This was attributed to significant electronic conduction throughout the electrolyte from anode/electrolyte interface to cathode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, voltage drop mainly occurs across the cathode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The variation of chemical potential of oxygen, mu(o2), within the GDC electrolyte was estimated, which showed a large drop in mu(o2) across the cathode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxygen partial pressure in GDC just inside the cathode was estimated to be similar to 10(-22) atm.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, in GDC-based anode-supported cells the effective electrolyte thickness is very small.
Titulo: Measurement of oxygen chemical potential in thin electrolyte film, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells
